## About SmartGit

SmartGit represents the professional Git client solution for developers and teams, offering powerful version control capabilities with an intuitive graphical interface across both macOS and Windows platforms. This sophisticated Git client provides comprehensive repository management tools that simplify complex Git operations while maintaining the flexibility and power of command-line Git. The streamlined interface combined with advanced Git features makes SmartGit the preferred choice for software developers, DevOps engineers, and development teams seeking to enhance their version control workflow without sacrificing the capabilities of the underlying Git system.

The application's extensive feature set includes sophisticated branching visualization that clearly displays repository structure and relationships, intelligent conflict resolution tools that guide users through merge conflicts with visual comparisons, and comprehensive repository management for handling multiple projects simultaneously. Whether you're managing complex feature branches, resolving difficult merge conflicts, reviewing commit histories, or coordinating with team members across distributed repositories, SmartGit delivers reliable performance with the visual clarity needed for efficient version control. The cross-platform compatibility ensures consistent Git management experiences whether working on macOS development environments or Windows workstations, while the integration with popular hosting services like GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket streamlines team collaboration and code review processes.

---

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS Systems:**
- macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
- 4GB RAM minimum (8GB recommended for large repositories)
- 300MB available storage space for application and repository caches
- Compatible with Intel and Apple Silicon processors
- Git installation for full command-line integration

**For Windows Platforms:**
- Windows 10 or later (64-bit architecture recommended)
- 4GB RAM (8GB recommended for optimal performance)
- 300MB available storage space
- .NET Framework 4.8 or later
- Git for Windows or similar Git distribution
